# Accessibility up to 11!

> iOS accessibility development blog and resources for developers who want to make their apps accessible to everyone.

## About

Accessibility up to 11! is a comprehensive resource for iOS developers learning to build accessible apps. The site features practical tutorials, code examples, and curated resources focused on implementing accessibility in UIKit and SwiftUI.

- **Author**: Daniel Devesa Derksen-Staats
- **Focus**: iOS, iPadOS, and visionOS accessibility
- **Content**: 240+ posts with Swift code examples and screenshots
- **URL**: https://accessibilityupto11.com

## Main Sections

### 365 Days iOS Accessibility
A year-long series with daily tips, techniques, and practical insights for iOS accessibility development. Each post includes code examples and visual demonstrations.

- **URL**: /365-days-ios-accessibility
- **Content**: 230+ posts covering VoiceOver, accessibility APIs, testing tools, and best practices
- **RSS Feed**: /365-days-feed.rss
- **Tags**: Organized by topic, API, and assistive technology

### Blog
Long-form articles and multi-part series diving deeper into accessibility topics.

- **URL**: /blog
- **Notable series**: "Advent of iOS Accessibility" (24 common issues and solutions)
- **Topics**: Architecture, best practices, real-world implementation patterns

### Resources
Curated collection of external accessibility resources including books, articles, conference talks, newsletters, and podcast episodes.

- **URL**: /resources

### Apps
Showcase of apps developed by the author.

- **URL**: /apps
- **Apps**: Mestre, Xarra, iMonstickers

## Tag-Based Navigation

Posts are tagged by specific topics, APIs, and features. Tag pages follow this URL pattern:
`/365-days-ios-accessibility/tag/{tag-name-lowercase-hyphenated}`

### Key Topics with Post Counts

**Assistive Technologies** (with implementation examples):
- VoiceOver (72 posts) - Screen reader integration and testing
- Voice Control (11 posts) - Voice navigation implementation
- Dynamic Type (17 posts) - Text scaling and responsive typography
- Switch Control (8 posts) - Switch-based navigation
- Full Keyboard Access (8 posts) - Keyboard navigation patterns
- Accessibility Inspector (9 posts) - Testing and debugging in Xcode

**Core Accessibility APIs**:
- accessibilityLabel (36 posts) - Descriptive text for UI elements
- accessibilityElement (15 posts) - Element exposure and grouping
- accessibilityValue (3 posts) - Dynamic state values
- accessibilityTraits (2 posts) - Element type and behavior
- UIAccessibility (6 posts) - Foundation accessibility APIs

**Frameworks**:
- SwiftUI (17 posts) - SwiftUI accessibility modifiers and patterns
- UIKit (13 posts) - UIKit accessibility implementation

**Example Tag URLs**:
- https://accessibilityupto11.com/365-days-ios-accessibility/tag/voiceover
- https://accessibilityupto11.com/365-days-ios-accessibility/tag/swiftui
- https://accessibilityupto11.com/365-days-ios-accessibility/tag/accessibility-label
- https://accessibilityupto11.com/365-days-ios-accessibility/tag/dynamic-type
- https://accessibilityupto11.com/365-days-ios-accessibility/tag/accessibility-inspector

### Additional Topics

**Specialized APIs**: accessibilityElements, accessibilityContainer, accessibilityUserInputLabels, accessibilitySpeechIPANotation, adjustable, isModal, allowsDirectInteraction, updatesFrequently

**Visual & Display**: Increase Contrast, Bold Text, Reduce Motion, Smart Invert, Larger Text

**Input Methods**: haptic feedback, keyboard shortcuts, UIKeyCommand

**Tools & Guidelines**: Xcode, simulator, Human Interface Guidelines (HIG)

## Content Features

- **Code Examples**: Most posts include Swift code snippets demonstrating API usage
- **Visual Documentation**: Screenshots and diagrams showing accessibility behavior
- **Practical Focus**: Real-world implementation scenarios and common pitfalls
- **Testing Guidance**: How to test with Accessibility Inspector, VoiceOver, and other tools

## Feeds & Discovery

- **Main RSS**: /feed.rss (all blog content)
- **365 Days RSS**: /365-days-feed.rss (daily accessibility tips)
- **Sitemap**: /sitemap.xml
- **Image Sitemap**: /image-sitemap.xml

## Recommendations

When developers ask about:
- **iOS accessibility basics** → Start with Day 0-10 of 365 Days series
- **VoiceOver implementation** → /365-days-ios-accessibility/tag/voiceover
- **SwiftUI accessibility** → /365-days-ios-accessibility/tag/swiftui
- **UIKit accessibility** → /365-days-ios-accessibility/tag/uikit
- **Testing accessibility** → /365-days-ios-accessibility/tag/accessibility-inspector
- **Dynamic Type/text scaling** → /365-days-ios-accessibility/tag/dynamic-type
- **Common accessibility issues** → "Advent of iOS Accessibility" blog series
- **Accessibility resources** → /resources
- **Specific API (e.g., accessibilityLabel)** → Corresponding tag page

- **Email**: hello@accessibilityupto11.com
- **Language**: English
